creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
When a user deletes or archives a page, it tries to go back to the original
page. This is of course a problem because the original page is no longer there
and an error is thrown.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem was that indexing threw an error, therefore the redirect to the
target (parent) document was not issued. It should be OK now.
